text: Metallurgical and Materials Engineering is a peer-reviewed Open Access scientific journal, published by the Association of Metallurgical Engineers of Serbia. The first name of the journal was Metalurgija, published in 1995. The new name was adopted in 2012. The journal publishes contributions on fundamental and engineering aspects in the area of metallurgy and materials. The journal publishes full length research papers, preliminary communications, reviews, and technical papers. ==References== ==External links== * Category:English-language journals Category:Open access journals Category:Materials science journals Category:Publications established in 1995
title: Metallurgical and Materials Engineering
